snippet: Hundreds of Americans lost their lives battling for control of parts of Iraq that are falling to militants with breathtaking speed.
abstract: News of advance of Islamic State in Iraq and Syria militants has left many United States veterans struggling to reconcile their sacrifices in Iraq with speed and magnitude with which northern part of the country is falling to insurgents; among comrades of troops who died or were wounded in those territories, there is a clear sense that capture of so many northern cities has imperiled everything American military once thought it might have accomplished.
lead_paragraph: Hundreds of Americans lost their lives battling for control of parts of Iraq that are falling to militants with breathtaking speed.

headline.main: Veterans Watch as Gains Their Friends Died for Are Erased by Insurgents
headline.print_headline: Veterans Watch as Gains Their Friends Died for Are Erased by Insurgents

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
